main.name: Emmanuel Sekyere
main.description: I specialize in FullStack Web Development with #React and #TypeScript. #TypeItTillYouMakeIt
main.bio: I am an ambivert. I love music, arts and photography. I believe strongly in personal development, hence, always learning new things. Currently, I am looking for new career opportunities my current job position cannot provide
main.contactmessage: Get in touch with me to receive further details, get coached or anything else.

education.description: I chose to study Information Technology to broaden my knowledge in the field (as I am self-taught) and it's been great so far, I must say. Courses I have aced in include Problem Solving and Programming, Applied IT Programming and Database Fundamentals

work.title: Logistics Personnel
work.description: Dangote Cement Plc is a Nigerian multinational publicly traded cement manufacturer headquartered in Lagos. The company is engaged in the manufacture, preparation, import, packaging, and distribution of cement and related products in Nigeria and has plants or import terminals in 9 other African countries including Ghana

resume.skillmessage: I'm a tinkerer and am always interested in playing around with new technologies but these are the ones that have really won me over

projects.title: Places App
projects.category: An app where users can share places (with image and location) with other users

projects.title: Places App API
projects.category: API Server for Places App - an app where users can share places (with image and coordinates) with other users

testimonials.text: It is my pleasure to recommend Emmanuel. His performance working as a Logistics Officer for Dangote Cement Ghana proves that he will be a valuable addition to any company
